trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_SEQ_00<tab>Wuk Lamat wonders how Fonjeantaine is getting on.

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_SEQ_01<tab>Wuk Lamat is curious to know if Fonjeantaine will follow through with his resolution to practice his craft in Tuliyollal. She suggests heading back to Wachumeqimeqi to see if he has spoken with Ropli yet.

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_SEQ_02<tab>You arrive in time to watch as Fonjeantaine finds his courage, and after explaining his situation to Ropli, the goldsmith successfully secures work as an artisan at Wachumeqimeqi. No sooner has he thanked you for your kind support than you receive a linkpearl call from Erenville. It seems he has finished making the necessary arrangements for your passage to the Moblin settlement.

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_SEQ_03<tab>Much to Wuk Lamat's dismay, it transpires that Erenville has requisitioned a large, barge-like boat which is to be pulled by a placid marine creature known as a punutiy. Koana then makes an unexpected appearance, along with his heretofore hidden collaborators─Thancred and Urianger. Your fellow Scions are seemingly delighted by the prospect of competing against their Archon comrades; however, now is not the occasion for such a competition, as the Second Promise will not be traveling on the river. Koana and his entourage soon depart, leaving you to prepare for the potential dangers of a journey along Ihuykatumu.
※To enlist your companion NPCs for this duty, speak with them near the entrance or access Duty Support via the main menu. Use the Duty Finder if you wish to complete the instance alongside fellow players.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_SEQ_04<tab>The contest takes you now to Kozama'uka. But what awaits on your river voyage remains to be seen...

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_SEQ_05<tab>Your plans to defend the riverboat are soon tested as Bakool Ja Ja releases wild creatures from his own barge to harass and harry you. Aggravated by your prowess, the two-head then turns his attention to your punutiy, wounding the creature and damaging the front of your vessel. Erenville is thus forced to ground the boat while you scout on ahead.
A perilous detour through an abandoned Yok Huy mine sees you encounter Koana and his entourage─yet while the meeting does not come to blows, they delay your progress nonetheless. Eventually, you emerge near the river, where you are rejoined by Erenville, Alisaie, and the recovered punutiy.
Your group sets off again and presently arrives at Dock Tumu. Encouraged to let her guard down by you and your companions, it seems Wuk Lamat has much to think about as you make for the nearby mountain camp...

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_SEQ_06<tab>Wuk Lamat gathers her thoughts, at last persuaded that sharing her burden is not only accepted but encouraged. The campsite at the top of the Flight of We Wingless should provide a comfortable place for her to confess how she truly feels.

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_SEQ_07<tab>An innocent question from Alisaie prompts Wuk Lamat to tell the story of her childhood with Gulool Ja Ja, culminating with the inadequacy she feels when compared to her accomplished brothers. With the aid of you and Krile, however, the Third Promise comes to better understand what it is that truly drives her. She resolves to continue her journey and to learn more of her beloved nation and its peoples as she walks a path of her own making.

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_SEQ_08<tab>In sharing her worries with her comrades, Wuk Lamat feels as though a crushing weight has been lifted from her breast, and she can take a full breath at last. Free from the burden of her self-imposed expectations, she is eager to carry on.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Fonjeantaine.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Erenville.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_TODO_02<tab>Enter Ihuykatumu.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_TODO_03<tab>Enter Ihuykatumu.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_001<tab>I can't help but wonder if Fonjeantaine will follow through. Let's see if he's actually gone to talk with Ropli!
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ROPLI_000_002<tab>Our lurker seems a changed man. I'm not sure it even <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> the same man.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_100_002<tab>You can do this, Fonjeantaine!
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_FONJEANTAINE_000_003<tab>'Twas kind of you to come, but you needn't worry. I've found my courage!
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_FONJEANTAINE_000_004<tab>Pray accept my apologies for my earlier behavior.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_FONJEANTAINE_000_005<tab>My name is Fonjeantaine, and I am a goldsmith from Ul'dah in faraway Eorzea.

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_FONJEANTAINE_000_006<tab>I realize this is a bold request, but I should like to continue practicing my trade here in Wachumeqimeqi─if you will have me! I ask only for the opportunity to bring happiness to others with my creations.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ROPLI_000_007<tab>So that's what it was about. You were looking for work.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ROPLI_000_008<tab>Consider yourself hired. Wachumeqimeqi is always in need of skilled craftsmen and women.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ROPLI_000_009<tab>I'll handle the necessary paperwork. Can you start tomorrow?
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_FONJEANTAINE_000_010<tab>Yes! Yes, of course!
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_FONJEANTAINE_000_011<tab>I must thank you both again for your sage and timely advice.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_012<tab>I don't know that I was all that helpful...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_FONJEANTAINE_000_013<tab>But you were. Had you not come to speak with me, I would not have had that moment of much-needed self-reflection.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_014<tab>(-Erenville-)The arrangements have been made. Come and meet me at the entrance of High Tide Harbor.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_015<tab>Oh, I almost forgot. Do you have my axe ready, Ropli?
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ROPLI_000_016<tab>Ready and waiting. Behold the sublime touch of a Wachumeqimeqi artisan.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_017<tab>Oho, it's as sharp and deadly as the first day I held it! Thank you!
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_018<tab>Well, good luck to you, Fonjeantaine. Let me know if that doubt creeps back in─I'd be happy to talk you out of it.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_019<tab>As for us, we should head for the harbor. Wouldn't want to keep Erenville waiting!
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ROPLI_000_020<tab>Always a happy day to add a new artisan to the ranks. Do let me know if there's anything else I can help you with.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_FONJEANTAINE_000_021<tab>I know better than to hold myself to an impossible standard. The only thing that matters is the joy my craft can bring to others.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_022<tab>I wonder what Erenville's alternate means of travel is...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KRILE_000_023<tab>I wandered through the bayside markets and found earrings almost identical to mine. They indeed seem to be a common travel charm, just as Mablu described.

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALPHINAUD_000_024<tab>I went to reexamine the Tuliyollal Saga. Should we continue apace, we shall soon come face-to-face─or rather, face-to-knee─with those enormous Yok Huy. I am told some of them tower over even the hulking Gulool Ja Ja.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>All that waiting was making me hungry, so I tried a taco from both Xbalyav Ty'e and Aunt Tii's. I think I prefer Tiisol's spicier flavors.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_030<tab>Enough with the secrecy─what's this big plan of yours!?
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_031<tab>Look there. <var 1A 02 /var>That<var 1A 01 /var> is my big plan.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_032<tab>What...what <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> that!?
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_033<tab>It's a punutiy. She'll be pulling our boat upriver.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_034<tab>How do we know she won't thrash about and sink us instead...?
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_035<tab>They're gentle and timid creatures. For the most part. She's unlikely to cause a fuss unless you give her reason to.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALISAIE_000_036<tab>First alpacas, now punutiys. We're relying a lot on animals for this journey.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KRILE_000_037<tab>We should be thankful we have an animal expert as our guide, then.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_038<tab>But did it have to be my old nemesis? Another boat...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_039<tab>Well, I took you for someone who was up to the challenge. Was I wrong?
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_040<tab>Ugh...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_041<tab>Long ago, when fighting still raged between the clans, the inhabitants of Kozama'uka rode these riverboats to move swiftly through hostile territory.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_042<tab>But the vessels see little use with Tural now at peace, so I was able to borrow one of the few which remain.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_043<tab>I did consider a dirigible, but the pilots warned me that the updrafts near the falls would make landing difficult.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALPHINAUD_000_044<tab>You said you borrowed “one,” yet there appear to be several on the water...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_045<tab>Koana!
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KOANA_000_046<tab>Lamaty'i. Traveling up the river, I presume?
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_047<tab>Seems that way. Does this mean you've earned two keystones already? I can't believe how well you've managed despite undertaking the contest alone.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KOANA_000_048<tab>I was never alone. I've had my own entourage with me since the beginning.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_THANCRED_000_049<tab>(-Thancred-)My friends, it's been...well, not that long.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALISAIE_000_050<tab>Thancred! Urianger! What are you doing here!?
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_THANCRED_000_051<tab>Escorting a Promise, the same as you.

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KOANA_000_052<tab>I'd heard much of the incomparable Archons during my time at the Studium. As soon as the contest was confirmed, I thought who better to recruit to my cause? I contacted the scholarch, who arranged an introduction to these two gentlemen.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_URIANGER_000_053<tab>The Second Promise had specific requirements: they who would be his assistants must boast both proven survival skills and mastery of the arcane arts.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_URIANGER_000_054<tab>Thus did Thancred and I receive the summons.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KOANA_000_055<tab>My own studies concentrated on technology which our people could readily use, such as inventions born of magitek or clever engineering.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KOANA_000_056<tab>Where magic was concerned, I covered only the foundation.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KRILE_000_057<tab>Knowing you two, I expect you had other reasons for accepting the job?
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_THANCRED_000_058<tab>A few. The nation of Tuliyollal spans an entire continent. Depending on who wins the throne, the world may be plunged into instability once more.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_THANCRED_000_059<tab>Ever have we striven to preserve peace. Where is our place, if not here and now?

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_THANCRED_000_060<tab>We did our due diligence, of course, and made sure of who we were working with before agreeing to this endeavor. He's even more opaque than Urianger at times, but is surprisingly─
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KOANA_000_061<tab>That's quite enough of that! We must be on our way!
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALISAIE_000_062<tab>Wait. I have one question before you leave.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALISAIE_000_063<tab>Koana and Wuk Lamat are vying for the throne. As Koana's entourage, does that mean you're resolved to defeat all his opponents...including us?
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_THANCRED_000_064<tab>We're sworn to do all in our power to win this contest for Koana─even if it means competing against our own comrades.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_THANCRED_000_065<tab>We intend to hold nothing back, and expect you to do the same.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALISAIE_000_066<tab>And we won't disappoint you!
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_067<tab>I thought you were taking a boat...

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KOANA_000_068<tab>If even <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> have been forced to travel on water, then the others will be doing the same. I would rather walk than risk confrontation on a leaky barge with no possibility of retreat.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_069<tab>It's true that I can't stand boats...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>But I trust the route Erenville has chosen for us!

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_071<tab>Leave the handling of the punutiy to me. Should other wildlife attack us, however, I may have difficulty keeping her under control. Do your best to draw them away─as far from the front of the boat as possible.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALPHINAUD_000_072<tab>Then we shall remain on deck and stand guard. Although it may be wise to have at least one of us sit up front with Erenville, just in case.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KRILE_000_073<tab>I'd like to stay on the deck. I'm eager to put my pictomancy to the proof...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KRILE_000_074<tab>And I'll take any chance to show you that I can hold my own on the battlefield!
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALPHINAUD_000_075<tab>Then Krile will stand on guard with <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALPHINAUD_000_076<tab>Then Krile will stand on guard with <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALISAIE_000_077<tab>I'll keep Erenville company, then. With my blade, I can respond more quickly to threats than Alphinaud.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_078<tab>Thank you. If a fight breaks out, I'll try to stay out of your way.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALPHINAUD_000_079<tab>Then I shall endeavor to provide aid where it is needed.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_080<tab>I can do that as well!
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_081<tab>That should cover most eventualities. Secure your gear, and board the boat when you're ready.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_BAKOOLJAJA_000_082<tab>(-Bakool Ja Ja the Mighty-)Gehehehe...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_BAKOOLJAJA_000_083<tab>(-Bakool Ja Ja the Mighty-)Let the hunt begin!
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_A1_000_001<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_A1_000_002<tab>Form a party and enter Ihuykatumu.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_090<tab>We can't stand here all day debating the dangers ahead─we have a contest to win!
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALPHINAUD_000_091<tab>As Koana said, once we're on the boat, there'll be little room to fight and nowhere to run. We must be prepared for all manner of threats.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KRILE_000_092<tab>This should be a good opportunity for you to see how far my training has progressed!
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_095<tab>We'll take this smaller boat to board the big vessel with the punutiy.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALISAIE_000_096<tab>Koana decided the river route was too risky, but I wonder how the other claimants are planning to travel...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALISAIE_000_110<tab>I was worried we might not catch up to you.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_111<tab>Those caverns you traversed were dug by the Yok Huy in their search for gold. Remnants of their excavations can be found throughout this region.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_112<tab>While I appreciate the lesson, O wise guide, are we...ulp...landing this boat any time soon?
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_113<tab>Our river journey is almost over. For proof of that, you need only look ahead...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALPHINAUD_000_114<tab>The falls were impressive enough from a distance, but it's almost too much now...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_115<tab>Yes, amazing... Now please let me off...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_116<tab>No...no more boats...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KRILE_000_117<tab>Are you...? Oh, you're not alright.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALPHINAUD_000_118<tab>I should be surprised if she was. Even without the nausea, we're all spent.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_119<tab>There is a mountain shelter nearby─a resting spot for those who've ascended the stairs. I suggest we make use of it.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALPHINAUD_000_120<tab>That would be a welcome respite.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALPHINAUD_000_121<tab>Have you the strength for a short walk, Wuk Lamat? We can rest along the way, too...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_122<tab>Damn it all...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_123<tab>A Promise is meant to lead from the front, not mewl and moan like a sick kitten...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KRILE_100_123<tab>Wuk Lamat...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_124<tab>...Ignore me, it's the nausea talking. I'm fine, really. Lead on. I'll follow.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KRILE_000_125<tab>Very well. But if I might say one thing...

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KRILE_000_126<tab>Just because you're a Promise or a claimant for the throne doesn't mean you can't be seen to struggle. You needn't bear this burden alone, so please don't hesitate to talk to us. We're always willing to lend an ear.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_127<tab>But, Krile, I...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_A2_000_001<tab>Everyone's allowed to be weak sometimes!
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_A2_000_002<tab>Leaning on others is a skill all leaders require.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_128<tab>You as well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...?
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_129<tab>I've always believed this is my problem alone, but perhaps you have the right of it...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_100_129<tab>Alright. I'll talk about...things. Just give me a moment to collect my thoughts.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KRILE_200_129<tab>Of course. As long as you need.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_300_129<tab>We'll be waiting at the shelter when you're ready.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_125<tab>I've long felt that I could never tell anyone when I was confused or hurting─that admitting to weakness would bring shame to Papa's name.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_126<tab>But if you say you're willing to listen, then...there <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> things I'd like to talk about.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_100_126<tab>Come on, let's catch up to the others.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_130<tab>Now that I've decided to share, I feel so nervous...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_131<tab>This place is called Many Fires for the constant stream of peddlers and travelers who make camp here after climbing the stairs.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KRILE_000_132<tab>This seems a cozy spot for Wuk Lamat to let her guard down. I know it can't be easy for her.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALISAIE_000_133<tab>This side of the region is so different from where the Hanu live. The striking colors of the vegetation alone...
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALPHINAUD_000_134<tab>We should stop here for the night.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALPHINAUD_000_135<tab>I understand the desire to rush ahead, but we need to recuperate from our punishing river adventure.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_136<tab>Then let's settle in. We'll need a cookfire, and there's meal preparation to be done.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ERENVILLE_000_140<tab>It is good to see Wuk Lamat more sure of herself.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_KRILE_000_141<tab>I'm glad we could take a moment to talk things through. Wuk Lamat seems much happier for it.

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALPHINAUD_000_142<tab>I have some small experience with the pressures of leadership─and crumbling beneath its weight, as you well know. If anything good can be said to have come of my failures, I hope it is my capacity to help others avoid similar mistakes.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_ALISAIE_000_143<tab>It doesn't matter if Wuk Lamat's scared of alpacas or gets sick on boats. It doesn't change who she is or what she means to her people.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_144<tab>Being able to say those things has brought me such relief. It's like a stone has been lifted off my chest, and I can take a full breath at last.
TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_WUKLAMAT_000_145<tab>I don't want to encumber myself like that again. I want to be better─<var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> be better. For myself and for my people.

TEXT_KINGMA120_04879_SYSTEM_000_150<tab>You may now enter Ihuykatumu with a party of NPC avatars. To make use of this feature, open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Trust<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
